title.rendered: Tastebudz Sticky Mango Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
🍋 Sticky Mango Strain – Autoflowering Cannabis Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Exotic Terpenes, Euphoric Highs – This Mango Means Business

Tastebudz Sticky Mango Strain Autoflowering Seeds combine the bold flavour of tropical mango with a powerful 30% THC punch. Created from Gorilla Gas Auto x Tangie Punch x Somango, this exotic indica-dominant hybrid is built for those who want fruity fire, fast.

With a flowering time of just 8–10 weeks and yields of up to 600g per plant outdoors, it’s a reliable, heavy-hitting addition to any seed collection. Whether you’re a first-time collector or a seasoned enthusiast, Sticky Mango strain delivers big on terpene content, potency, and visual appeal.

⚠️ Please note: These seeds are sold as adult souvenirs in accordance with UK law. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license.

📊 Sticky Mango Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Gorilla Gas Auto x Tangie Punch x Somango
Strain Type Indica-Dominant Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–10 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield 400–450g/m²
Outdoor Yield 500–600g/plant
THC Content Up to 30%
Flavours Mango, citrus, sweet fruit
Aromas Tropical, tangy, sweet and earthy
Effects Euphoric, energising, uplifting

🍍 Flavour & Aroma of Sticky Mango Strain

Prepare your senses for a tropical overload. Sticky Mango strain delivers a juicy, mouthwatering terpene profile that’s bursting with exotic fruit flavour. Upfront, you’ll get waves of ripe mango, followed by a zesty citrus punch that dances across the palate. As you exhale, subtle notes of sweet orange rind, candied lime, and a touch of earthy depth create a rich, layered finish that lingers long after the smoke has cleared.

From the first twist of your grinder to the final exhale, Sticky Mango fills the air with a bold fruit cocktail aroma – sweet, tangy, and impossible to ignore. It’s like sipping a mango smoothie on a sun-drenched beach – refreshing, indulgent, and unforgettable.

💥 Potency & Effects of Sticky Mango Strain

Don’t let the smooth flavour fool you – Sticky Mango packs serious power. With THC levels soaring to 30%, this is one of the most potent autoflowering strains in the Tastebudz lineup. The high is fast-acting and exhilarating: expect an immediate burst of euphoria and creative energy, sharpening focus and brightening mood.

As the initial lift settles, a gentle wave of physical relaxation takes over – soothing without sedating. This makes Sticky Mango ideal for those who want uplifting daytime vibes without losing momentum. Whether you’re socialising, deep in a creative project, or simply need a feel-good boost, Sticky Mango delivers clarity, motivation, and mellow balance in one fruity hit.

🌱 About Sticky Mango Autoflower Seeds

These autoflowering cannabis seeds are part of the Tastebudz Auto Mix 2 Pack — a curated bundle featuring two of our top-performing autos. Known for their fast turnaround and bold terpene profiles, this mix pack is ideal for collectors seeking tropical flavour and standout potency. Sticky Mango Auto delivers high yields, vibrant flavour, and THC-packed performance in one collectible powerhouse.

Let me know if you’d like the short description next or want to update the Auto Mix 2 Pack product page to cross-link back to Sticky Mango and its pair.

🌟 Why Choose Sticky Mango Auto Strain?

🔸 Developed from a triple cross of Gorilla Gas Auto, Tangie Punch, and Somango for truly exotic genetics
🔸 Packs up to 30% THC – one of the strongest strains in the Tastebudz autoflower lineup
🔸 Dense, crystal-covered buds with tropical resin appeal – a collector’s dream
🔸 Part of the Auto Mix 2 Pack, alongside other bold-flavoured autos
🔸 Naturally rich in therapeutic terpenes like Linalool, Myrcene, and Alpha Bisabolol
🔸 Offers fast flower time with complex aromas rarely found in autoflowers
🔸 Loved for its mood-lifting daytime effects without full-on sedation
🔸 Highly rated by flavour-chasers and terp-heads for unique profile

❓ FAQ – Sticky Mango Strain

1. What is the Sticky Mango strain?
Sticky Mango is an autoflowering indica-dominant hybrid combining Gorilla Gas Auto, Tangie Punch, and Somango. It’s known for fruity terps, fast flowering, and high potency.

2. What does Sticky Mango strain taste like?
Expect rich mango sweetness layered with zesty citrus and earthy undertones — an exotic and refreshing flavour explosion.

3. How long does Sticky Mango Auto take to finish?
This strain finishes in 8–10 weeks from seed to harvest, making it one of the quicker options in our autoflowering line.

4. What kind of effects does Sticky Mango have?
Sticky Mango delivers an uplifting, euphoric buzz paired with physical calm — great for mood enhancement and daytime use.

5. Is Sticky Mango strain suitable for beginners?
Yes! It’s an easy-to-manage strain that performs well in a variety of environments, making it beginner-friendly while still satisfying experienced collectors.
